2F. Maximum-minimum Problems
2F. 最大最小问题

2F-1 Find the point(s) on each of the following surfaces which is closest to the origin. (Hint: it’s easier to minimize the square of the distance, rather than the distance itself.)
2F-1 找到以下每个表面上离原点最近的点。 （提示：最小化距离的平方比最小化距离本身更容易。）
a) x y z 2 = 1 x y z 2 = 1 xyz^(2)=1x y z^{2}=1
b) x 2 − y z = 1 x 2 − y z = 1 x^(2)-yz=1x^{2}-y z=1

2F-2 一个矩形的农产品箱将由纸板制成；侧面为单层厚度，前面和后面为双层厚度，底部为三层厚度，顶部留空。
Its volume is to be 1 cubic foot; what proportions for the sides will use the least cardboard?
其体积为 1 立方英尺；边的比例应如何才能使用最少的纸板？

(Hint: take the plane in the form z = a x + b y + c z = a x + b y + c z=ax+by+cz=a x+b y+c, where a a aa and b b bb are the independent variables.)
2F-3* 考虑所有通过点 ( 2 , 1 , 1 ) ( 2 , 1 , 1 ) (2,1,1)(2,1,1) 的平面，并且在三个坐标轴上的截距都是正的。对于这些平面，哪一个的三个截距的乘积最小？（提示：取平面形式为 z = a x + b y + c z = a x + b y + c z=ax+by+cz=a x+b y+c ，其中 a a aa 和 b b bb 是自变量。）

D = ∑ i = 1 n ( y i − ( a x i + b ) ) 2 D = ∑ i = 1 n   y i − a x i + b 2 D=sum_(i=1)^(n)(y_(i)-(ax_(i)+b))^(2)D=\sum_{i=1}^{n}\left(y_{i}-\left(a x_{i}+b\right)\right)^{2}
which was in the reading on least squares, and differentiation (use the chain rule). Sketch the line and the three points as a check.

a)* ( 0 , 0 ) , ( 0 , 2 ) , ( 1 , 3 ) ( 0 , 0 ) , ( 0 , 2 ) , ( 1 , 3 ) (0,0),(0,2),(1,3)(0,0),(0,2),(1,3)
b)* ( 0 , 0 ) , ( 1 , 2 ) , ( 2 , 1 ) ( 0 , 0 ) , ( 1 , 2 ) , ( 2 , 1 ) (0,0),(1,2),(2,1)(0,0),(1,2),(2,1)

Hint: use the fact that for all values of u u uu, we have ∑ 1 n ( x i − u ) 2 ≥ 0 ∑ 1 n   x i − u 2 ≥ 0 sum_(1)^(n)(x_(i)-u)^(2) >= 0\sum_{1}^{n}\left(x_{i}-u\right)^{2} \geq 0, since squares are always non-negative. 提示：利用 u u uu 的所有值，我们有 ∑ 1 n ( x i − u ) 2 ≥ 0 ∑ 1 n   x i − u 2 ≥ 0 sum_(1)^(n)(x_(i)-u)^(2) >= 0\sum_{1}^{n}\left(x_{i}-u\right)^{2} \geq 0 ，因为平方总是非负的。将左侧写成关于 u u uu 的二次多项式。通常它没有根。这对系数有什么暗示？它什么时候有根？（通过使用二次公式回答这两个问题。）

2G-5* What equations are you led to for determining a a aa when you try to fit the exponential curve y = e a x y = e a x y=e^(ax)y=e^{a x} to two data points ( 1 , y 1 ) , ( 2 , y 2 ) 1 , y 1 , 2 , y 2 (1,y_(1)),(2,y_(2))\left(1, y_{1}\right),\left(2, y_{2}\right) by the method of least squares?
2G-5* 当你尝试通过最小二乘法将指数曲线 y = e a x y = e a x y=e^(ax)y=e^{a x} 拟合到两个数据点 ( 1 , y 1 ) , ( 2 , y 2 ) 1 , y 1 , 2 , y 2 (1,y_(1)),(2,y_(2))\left(1, y_{1}\right),\left(2, y_{2}\right) 时，你会得到什么方程来确定 a a aa ？
The moral is: don’t do it this way. In general to fit an exponential y = c e a x y = c e a x y=ce^(ax)y=c e^{a x} to a set of data points ( x i , y i ) x i , y i (x_(i),y_(i))\left(x_{i}, y_{i}\right), take the log of both sides:
道德是：不要这样做。一般来说，要将指数 y = c e a x y = c e a x y=ce^(ax)y=c e^{a x} 拟合到一组数据点 ( x i , y i ) x i , y i (x_(i),y_(i))\left(x_{i}, y_{i}\right) ，请对两边取对数：
ln ⁡ y = a x + ln ⁡ c ln ⁡ y = a x + ln ⁡ c ln y=ax+ln c\ln y=a x+\ln c
This gives a linear function in the variables x x xx and ln ⁡ y ln ⁡ y ln y\ln y, whose coefficients a a aa and ln ⁡ c ln ⁡ c ln c\ln c can be determined by applying the method of least squares to fit the data points ( x i , ln ⁡ y i ) x i , ln ⁡ y i (x_(i),ln y_(i))\left(x_{i}, \ln y_{i}\right).
这给出了一个关于变量 x x xx 和 ln ⁡ y ln ⁡ y ln y\ln y 的线性函数，其系数 a a aa 和 ln ⁡ c ln ⁡ c ln c\ln c 可以通过应用最小二乘法来拟合数据点 ( x i , ln ⁡ y i ) x i , ln ⁡ y i (x_(i),ln y_(i))\left(x_{i}, \ln y_{i}\right) 。
